<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Eldritch Researcher Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2658) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Abomination Vaults</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil](/Sources.aspx?ID=75) pg. 76</row>

**Archetype** [Eldritch Researcher](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=89)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2); Trained in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)

</column>

---

You gain the ability to cast a single arcane or occult cantrip of your choice (which is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up). If you weren't already, you become trained in that tradition's spell DCs and spell attack rolls with Intelligence as your spellcasting ability.

 Regardless of whether you choose an arcane or occult cantrip, you also become an expert in your choice of either Arcana or Occultism. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks you attempt with the chosen skill when [Investigating](/Actions.aspx?ID=516) or [Identifying Magic](/Actions.aspx?ID=24).

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the Eldritch Researcher archetype.

<title level="2">Eldritch Researcher Dedication leads to...</title>
[Able Ritualist](/Feats.aspx?ID=2662), [Advanced Seeker of Truths](/Feats.aspx?ID=2665), [Entities from Afar](/Feats.aspx?ID=2667), [Incredible Recollection](/Feats.aspx?ID=2668), [Know it All](/Feats.aspx?ID=2664), [Lorefinder](/Feats.aspx?ID=2663), [Scholarly Defense](/Feats.aspx?ID=2661), [Seeker of Truths](/Feats.aspx?ID=2659), [Strange Script](/Feats.aspx?ID=2660), [Words of Unraveling](/Feats.aspx?ID=2666)
